name: Genetec Video File
summary: A G64X file is a video file saved in the Genetec video format, which is used to share or archive video recorded by Genetec's Security Center software. It stores H.264 encoded surveillance video from a police body camera or building security camera. G64X files can be played by the Genetec Video Player (replaced Portable Archive Player) included with Security Center.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
